transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello, hello. Hello. Good morning, ma'am.
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Ma'am, main Malvika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Ji boliye ma'am. Kal baat hui thi ma'am hamari. Ma'am aapne feedback mein not satisfied de diya hai. Kya reason hai ma'am?
Customer: Ah, nahi sorry maine abhi tak koi matlab feedback diya tha.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Sorry ma'am abhi tak koi feedback nahi diya tha. Main aisa toh nahi bolunga maine satisfied nahi ho rahi hu toh.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi. Ma'am dekhiye hamare paas feedback jo aaya hai. I think aapke mistake se hua ya jaise bhi hua ho, feedback jo hamare paas aaya hai woh not satisfied ka aaya hai.
Customer: No no ma'am main dobara aapke paas bhej de rahi hu is cheez ke liye. I think woh shayad nahi ho payega toh aap mujhe bata dijiye main closer iska kar du matlab kyunki kal ka nahi arrange hua hai toh phir kya karna hai iska.
Executive: Ma'am abhi morning ka time hai ma'am. Subah subah nahi ho pata mujhe aur bhi kaam hote hai. Nahi ma'am main closer ke liye puch rahi hu matlab koi concern toh nahi hai jiski wajah se aapne dissatisfied diya ho main yeh puch rahi hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai. Nahi sorry ma'am. Woh main aapko sorry bol rahi hu is cheez ke liye.
Executive: It's okay ma'am. Hamare paas woh galti se ho gaya hoga. Woh galti se ho gaya hoga. Nahi nahi I'm so sorry. Nahi nahi ma'am kal night ke ghar ke uss time pe dissatisfied aapka aaya toh thoda concern tha ki baatein sab sahi hui hai. Video meeting bhi schedule hui thi aaj ki. Woh na galti se ho gaya hoga. Sorry is cheez ke liye. Accha aap ek baar zara call pe jaake check kare ki dissatisfied likh hua tha aap se. Whatsapp pe zara check kare usme likh ke aa raha hoga agar aapne click kiya hoga na toh usme likh ke aa raha hoga whatsapp pe. Call par bhi jaake dekhiyega.
Customer: Hmm, do minute rukiye IndiaMART.
Executive: Five, ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Aapne I think 5:49 ke around diya hai. Thank you ma'am.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji ma'am. It is saying. Haan haan sorry ma'am woh galti se ho gaya. Main dobara se message kar de rahi hu satisfied ka.
Customer: Woh theek hai ma'am lekin thoda sa matlab careful rahiyega is cheez ke liye. Kyunki woh thoda impact daalta hai hum logo ke usse.
Customer: Ma'am actually main bhai sorry maine check kiya toh mere seniors puch rahe the ki matlab kya issue ho gaya kyun ma'am ne dissatisfied diya toh maine bola ki baat toh sab theek hui hai. Nahi nahi nahi. Kai saare number hote hai mujhe aur bhi cheezo ko dekhna woh galti se ho gaya aapke pe. Woh galti se hua hai. Haan isliye unke liye specially main sorry bol rahi hu.
Executive: Koi baat nahi ma'am. Aap mujhe yeh bata dijiye main aapko kab connect karu uske video meeting ke liye aap mujhe time bata dijiye.
Customer: Aap mujhe normal meeting kar sakte hai mere saath.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Matlab call pe kar sakte hai kyunki na dekho video call ke liye na itna time nahi hota hum aapke paas bhi.
Executive: Aapne 1 baje ka time diya tha ma'am. Haan agar ho sake toh main kar sakti hu kyunki abhi dekho. Time. Ma'am main khud call kar lungi aapke paas. Theek hai?
Customer: Accha aap kar lenge. Call pe agar main batana chahu toh mujhe kya kya cheeze bata du main jo aap kar lenge correct?
Executive: Haan aap mujhe IndiaMART ki jo batana chah rahi thi woh bata dijiye.
Customer: Nahi woh toh woh main bata dungi lekin aap sab cheeze aap samajh pao satisfied kar pao isliye satisfied cheeze hoti hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Koi nahi ma'am main likh ke rakh lungi. Main bata dungi.
Executive: Ji ji. Toh abhi main bata du ya phir main baad mein hi call karu aapko time. Nahi nahi bata do abhi call pe hi. Suniye abhi call pe hi toh abhi bata dijiye.
Customer: Aur video meeting mein aap matlab phir main sure na samjhu ya main 1 baje connect karne ki koshish karu phir se?
Customer: Nahi nahi ma'am abhi bata dijiye dekho mujhe bhi kaam hota hai kai. Kai baar yeh hota hai ki kahin jaana padta hai mujhe kuch kaam se.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Isliye ma'am. Actually ma'am main verbally bata deti hu aapko kya kya issues hai. Actually mein aapke chaar products mein pricing nahi hai.
Customer: Kya nahi hai ma'am?
Executive: Price nahi hai price.
Customer: Price nahi hai. Okay aur?
Executive: Aur uske alawa teen products mein photos nahi hai.
Customer: Photos nahi hai. Okay aur?
Executive: Aur uske alawa nine products aise hai. Yeh sab cheeze aap desktop pe use karte ho IndiaMART ya mobile app pe?
Customer: Ah, desktop pe IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Desktop pe. Desktop pe use karte ho aap. Toh desktop mein jab aap uss par jaha pe products saare likh ke aate hai na ki 260 products hai wahin pe side mein side yeh likhi hui hai. Toh aap waha se yeh dekh lo ki kaun se chaar products aise hai jisme price nahi hai. Sab cheeze aur 260 products hai agar aap scroll karte rahoge na bahut time lag jayega aapko.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Theek hai. 947 mein specifications nahi hai. Dekho unme price nahi hai aur teen ke photo nahi hai. Okay ma'am aur main aapko bata deti hu. Aur ek baar nine products mein specifications nahi hai matlab kya material hai, kya size hai yeh sab cheeze bhi missing hai usme.
Customer: Okay ma'am. Main abhi recheck karti hu aur aur thank you products mein ek minute bas ek minute bas aadhe baat aapki sunne ke liye na teen products mein aapke koi description nahi add hai.
Executive: Toh description. Toh aap mujhe bata do toh main add kar dungi apne level pe. No no no ma'am main kar de rahi kar dungi koi woh bada kaam nahi hai. Ji haan ji haan ji. Toh woh aap apne level pe add kar dena. Aur ek cheez dekh lijiyega ki out of 100 ek score diya hota hai right side mein. Har product ke right side mein ek score diya hota hai. Toh aapko woh score increase kare jab aap sab kuch cheeze add kar doge na specifications aur photos add kar dengi toh woh score aapka jo hai woh 80 ke aas paas pahuch jaana chahiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 80 se kam score theek nahi hota usme sab cheeze aap tab tak add ho jayengi. Itna aap kar dijiyega agar mujhe uske baad bhi issue kuch dikhega main kal ek baar wapas se phir kar dungi agar mujhe kuch dikhta hai. Aur aap mujhe dobara message nahi aap mujhe dobara message kariye main aapko satisfied ka message kar deti hu. Actually mein abhi aapka phir se feedback aayega. Toh aapka feedback waha se kar dijiyega. Theek hai? Ji ji ji. Theek hai phir. Thank you so much ma'am.
Customer: Welcome. Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer gave 'not satisfied' feedback by mistake.

- Four products missing pricing.

- Three products missing photos.

- Nine products missing specifications.

- Three products missing description.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer's feedback issue.

- Customer apologized for the incorrect feedback.

- Executive explained the issues with the products.

- Executive asked the customer to correct the issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will correct the product issues.

- Customer will send a satisfied feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, products, pricing, specifications, photos
